text: Bhattian is a village located in the Ludhiana West tehsil, of Ludhiana district, Punjab. ==Administration== The village is administrated by a Sarpanch who is an elected representative of village as per constitution of India and Panchayati raj (India). {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Particulars !! Total !! Male!!Female |- | Total No. of Houses||245|| || |- | Population ||1,234 ||640 ||594 |- | Child (0-6) ||116||59||57 |- | Schedule Caste ||226 ||117||109 |- | Schedule Tribe || 0||0 ||0 |- | Literacy ||84.97 % || 86.06 % ||83.80 |- | Total Workers ||427||375||52 |- | Main Worker ||408|| 0||0 |- | Marginal Worker ||19|| 15 ||4 |- |} ==Cast== The village constitutes 18.31% of Schedule Caste and the village doesn't have any Schedule Tribe population. ==Villages in Ludhiana West Tehsil== ==Air travel connectivity== The closest airport to the village is Sahnewal Airport. ==External links== * Villages in Ludhiana West Tehsil ==References== Category:Villages in Ludhiana West tehsil
title: Bhattian (Ludhiana West)
